data.comment: We are now ready for the penalty shootout!

Diego Valeri (Portland) converts his penalty!
Franco Jara (Dallas) succeeds from the penalty spot.

Bressan (Dallas) scores!

The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 7-8.
The first-half is now underway.
